alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Jones; Putnam (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 6:50PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Baldwin, southern Putnam and northeastern Jones Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 650 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms extended from near Willard to Bradley, and moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Eatonton, Gray, Meriwether, Ethridge, Bradley, Wayside, Haddock, Resseaus Crossroads, Round Oak, Warfield, Rockville, Plant Harlee Branch, Stanfordville, Blountsville and Browns Crossing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
